column1: I was so proud to have the opportunity to march in the Fox Valley #WomensMarch2020. We have made great progress in the fight for women’s equality but we cannot settle. Our voices are louder together!

I added my name to a letter calling on the Dept. of Education to put a stop to the use of isolated timeouts.  It is appalling that children are being treated this way with such blatant disregard for their physical and mental health.    https://t.co/juTxHxtMzF

I and my fellow colleagues in the House carefully listen and weighed the evidence before voting to #impeach the President. I can only hope the newly sworn in Senate jurors do the same. I urge the Senate to call witnesses and hear the new evidence! https://t.co/7nrScleOM0

Article 2 of the Articles of Impeachment refer to obstructing this Congressional investigation and I think that what we’re seeing from Lev Parnas is proof that obstruction occurred.  https://t.co/xlqKVQxJTC

We cannot go to war with Iran. And the actions of the President put us on a dangerous path towards another war in the Middle-East. We need to understand the true motives behind this attack. https://t.co/EexE89lyG3

Today along with my colleagues on both sides of the aisle I voted to curb President Trump's ability to launch us into a war with Iran. Instead we underlined Congress' war powers. My priority is and has always been keeping the American people safe and out of harms way.

.@willfornj2 is a former House Oversight Investigator and staffer of mine who launched his campaign today to run for Congress in New Jersey. Please take a look at Will's announcement video and share with your friends and colleagues. https://t.co/lwnrSqS76I

It is imperative that we take all steps necessary to protect our forces & personnel against the reprisals and threats to come. This Admin must work with Congress to prevent the current situation from escalating into another endless war in the Middle East. https://t.co/sfyzp2FI3M
On CNN yesterday talking about the Senate impeachment trial and the need for a fair process as we move forward. https://t.co/21HlVdbHiq

The House was quite busy passing landmark legislation in 2019. We worked to move forward bills like prescription drug reform to gun violence prevention. We have done our job now it is the time to keep the pressure on the Senate! https://t.co/x6vnUbRNm1
Looking back on the beginning of this decade I found one of my first political ads. From running for IL Comptroller in 2010 to now a member of Congress!   https://t.co/46Cf43D1RG
The Krishnamoorthi Family wish you and your family a healthy happy and peaceful holiday season! Thank you for your friendship and we look forward to what awaits in 2020. https://t.co/8NRC1Hdo2K

Our high school students are chewing nicotine gum to curb their addiction caused by e-cigarettes. This is unacceptable. We need to do everything in our power to protect our children and we need to hold those responsible who put them in harms way! https://t.co/2rSQMMEoLM

I voted to impeach President Trump last night. President Trump abused his power. He threatened our democracy and obstructed Congress. He compromised our election and national security. I swore an oath to protect the constitution and that is what I did last night.

The meteoric rise in youth vaping has created a national public health crisis. If we need to educate on the dangers of vaping. If we do it now we have a chance of arresting this epidemic. And we have to do it immediately.  https://t.co/8QCX5D6tN3

Healthcare costs are a burden to too many of the residents of the IL-8. But I am proud to help pass H.R. 3 the Elijah E. Cummings Lower Drug Costs Now Act. This legislation will help lower drug prices and save millions of $ for older Americans w/ fixed $ https://t.co/dxYWLaNl94

Healthcare costs are a burden to many of the residents of the IL-8th. But I am proud to help pass H.R. 3 the Elijah E. Cummings Lower Drug Costs Now Act. This legislation will help lower drug prices and save millions of $$ for older Americans w/ fixed $! https://t.co/dxYWLaNl94
After weeks of #ImpeachmentInquiry I believe there’s ongoing wrongdoing in the White House right now with regard to Ukraine and potentially even other countries. https://t.co/gz9t75IWKk

I am so proud to receive the endorsement of @PPact. I firmly believe that all women deserve access to quality reproductive health care. I will continue to protect these rights throughout my tenure in Congress! https://t.co/d9nQez6uDG

“Protecting our kids cannot be a partisan issue. It’s got to be something that is top of mind for all of us.” #EndingYouthVaping is a top priority! I am proud of the work my colleagues & I have done trying to hold Juul accountable regarding this crisis.   https://t.co/mDkbWmhldi

It seems we can no longer rely on the manufacturer's safety assurances. Johnson & Johnson told us for decades their baby powder was safe but it wasn't. As chair of the subcommittee investigating talc I am going to get to the bottom of what is going on. https://t.co/IBL3NSG8Bk

The American public is waiting for action. But the FDA claims they have not reached a final decision on whether or not to implement the ban on flavor e-cigarettes. We cannot wait anymore. The American public wants results & so do  I #BanFlavorECigarettes! https://t.co/etnZaqD0ko

As cohair of the caucus to end this vaping epidemic I signed the letter (along with 27 of my fellow colleagues) urging the President to uphold the #flavorban. We need to protect our children from the tobacco industry.  https://t.co/677NnPIvxb

The e-cigarette lobby is putting profits above the safety of our children. They are holding up the #flavorban on all e-cigarettes which the President already agreed to implement. This is unacceptable!

Bullying in schools isn't a new concern but for students in the minority and LGBTQ communities the harassment  is oftentimes worse. This shouldn't be happening. I am proud to propose legislation to help states put a STOP to bullying in their schools. https://t.co/PFGN14wtkr
Happy Thanksgiving. This special time of year affords us the opportunity to strengthen family bonds and give thanks to all of our loved ones. May you and your family have a wonderful and safe day.
I sat down with John Williams to discuss what happened during the most recent #ImpeachmentHearings from the most compelling testimony to my now viral video.   https://t.co/u8s5u1bhEP

Very excited to announce that I have officially filed for re-election! I have been beyond blessed to served the people of IL-8th these past few years. Together we will continue to strengthen our community and move this country forward. #2moreyears https://t.co/V8QelkT6rF
The intensity of this week's hearings are hard to describe. However @nytimes did an excellent job capturing the candid moments during the #ImpeachingHearing  https://t.co/LEeUG6py7s
Even after two intense weeks of hearings it is nice to come back home to the IL-8th.   Here is a brief recap on what happened this past week #ImpeachmentHearings    https://t.co/OCeX9O2lWt

I want answers now! It appears President Trump is walking back on the proposed flavor ban. We cannot let the tobacco and e-cigarette lobby put our children at risk. We need to stand together and #EndYouthVaping!  https://t.co/kV543CH0wd

The President's behavior during these #impeachmenthearings is very troubling. Threatening to move or relocate gov't officials who plan to testify to the House Intel committee is intimidation. @andersoncooper and I discuss what is really happening in DC. https://t.co/uPhF8s0u9F

“[Fmr. Amb. Sondland] definitely had the president’s ear on Ukraine B. He was interested in helping run it the policy on Ukraine and C. He was very annoyed that (Trump personal attorney) Rudy Giuliani had anything to do with it." ”https://t.co/Sky7Urk8XR

Fmr. Ambassador Yovanovitch served this country with honor and distinction. The President tried to intimidate her. These inquiries are key to getting to the truth on what happened in Ukraine. https://t.co/yzVI9jHgcK

I am proud to have reintroduced “The Investing in American Workers Act”. This legislation is vital to train workers for the future jobs of this economy. By investing in our workforce development we are helping move families up the economic ladder.

Happy #VeteransDay to all the men and women who served. Please thank the veterans in your life for their service. Let’s let them know that though they may no longer wear their uniform we will never forget their service and sacrifice for our country.

Juul may have knowingly sold nearly 1 MILLION contaminated Juul pods. If JUUL did this this lack of accountability is unacceptable and puts the public in danger and I’m committed to getting to the bottom of this issue. https://t.co/ONt6FdfCmy
Just got off of @MSNBC where we discuss next Wednesday’s Ambassador Bill Taylor’s hearing. I am looking forward to hearing what Amb. Bill Taylor has to say. https://t.co/cfcM52krmp

Attacking the whistleblower is akin to blaming the individual who pulled the fire alarm when the building is burning down. I am taking this inquiry seriously in the hopes of finding out the truth.  https://t.co/Z8MWdVkRlM

The vote regarding the impeachment inquiry was about authorizing the process not a vote impeaching the President. Here is my latest interview with @AliVelshi on this subject. https://t.co/pksJ5CvuLT via @YouTube

Millions of kids worldwide go to bed hungry. The lack of proper nutrition is harming these children’s development. Childhood hunger is a fixable problem. I am proud to have partnered with my colleague Rep. Darin LaHood (IL-18th) on supporting H.R.189. https://t.co/tTy83huqLD
We are still waiting for the FDA to implement the flavor ban on e-cigs. This issue shouldn't be ignored. #ActNow https://t.co/wsUu0Ngt6j

Even Members of Congress "go" Trick or Treating. But instead of candy I'm knocking on your twitter feed for help for my re-election campaign. A few "chocolate coins" goes a long way #trickortreat #HappyHalloween https://t.co/IA4kF9tHMj
We need to hold the FDA accountable! The FDA needs implement the flavor ban on e-cigarettes NOW. Too many have been harmed due to vaping related side affects. #EnoughisEnough https://t.co/wsUu0Ngt6j

I came to Congress to work. I am working now w/ my colleagues on issues like the dangers of #teenvaping. But while I don’t welcome this impeachment inquiry you can rely on me to work w/my colleagues to conduct it throughly and expeditiously.  https://t.co/N91QnHTfGk

It's been more than a month since the FDA said it would provide guidance on flavored e-cigarettes and the alarming rise of teen vaping.   We are still waiting ...   #flavorbanNOW  https://t.co/hHuMMtyXCW
Don’t forget to thank a Union member today for all of the protections we enjoy as workers. Happy #LaborDay2019 from Team Raja to you! https://t.co/FE9Eri3qcX

I am committed to investigating Juul and its disturbing marketing tactics that target minors. This is the same playbook that Big Tobacco used and no wonder because Big Tobacco has already purchased 35% of Juul's shares. https://t.co/ShkYn89VqF
